name: Quarantine routine
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 47 Gamejam.

Theme: Stuck in a loop

THE GAME:

Due to an ongoing pandemic, the government has prohibited to go outside until further notice...
                                                ... but you still have to complete your daily tasks!

How many days will you survive without losing your mind because of the stress?

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Complete all daily tasks (marked with an e)

- Failing the tasks will add stress!

- Completing tasks takes time

- Uncompleted tasks will add stress at the end of day or if you go to sleep

- Keep a healthy garden to avoid stressing out

- Sleep at least 8h for optimal relaxation

- Not sleeping for a long time will carry consequences

- Keep your stress level under 100 at all times or it will be over!

- There are secret ways to "relief" some stress. Can you find them?

TASKS/MINIGAMES:
- Garden: Take care of the plants by planting, watering and healing sick plants. Click to select the tools and click on each plant to use them.

- Work: Write the words as written before. Try to do it as fast as you can. The font is barely readable, but that's part of the fun, innit?

- Workout: Some exercise to keep you sane. Click the indicated keys to complete the game. There's no bonus points to do it following the music, but hey, it's immersive.

- Cook: Select a recipe and drop the ingredients in the pot in the correct order. Cooking can actually be relaxing, but only if you do it properly!

- Grocery Shopping: Move the character to the groceries and use E to throw them in the direction of your mouse cursor. Your goal is to throw them into the cart before you gain too much stress from all the hassle.

- There are some secrets way to relief stress! Try to click E around some objects that may remind you to some relaxing activities of your day to day...

For the best experience we recommend to play in FULLSCREEN MODE. You can activate it by clicking the button in the bottom right corner of the game screen.

CONTROLS:
For this game you will need a keyboard and a mouse.

Movement: W, A, S, D
Use: E
You will also need to use the Arrow keys in one minigame.
